faqs.question: How do I use the markdown formatting in FAQs?
faqs.answer:
# Markdown Formatting Guide

## Text Styling
Formatted Example:
**Bold text**, *Italic text*, ~~Strikethrough~~

[raw-markdown]To create this formatting use:
• **Bold text** using `**double asterisks**`
• *Italic text* using `*single asterisks*`
• ~~Strikethrough~~ using `~~tildes~~`

## Headers
Formatted Example:
# Main Header
## Sub Header
### Smaller Header

To create headers use:
# H1 using `# Text`
## H2 using `## Text`
### H3 using `### Text`

## Lists
Formatted Example:
1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

• Bullet point one
• Bullet point two

To create lists use:
1. Just type `1. Your text`
2. Numbers auto-format

• Use `•` for bullets

## Special Elements
Formatted Example:
[info]This is an info box[/info]
[warning]This is a warning box[/warning]
[note]This is a note box[/note]

To create special elements use:
`[info]This is an info box[/info]`
`[warning]This is a warning box[/warning]`
`[note]This is a note box[/note]`

## Collapsible Sections
Formatted Example:
[details]Click me|Hidden content appears here[/details]

To create collapsible sections use:
`[details]Title|Content[/details]`

## Colors and Links
Formatted Example:
[color:red]Red text[/color]
[color:#64ffda]Custom color[/color]
[link]https://example.com|Click here[/link]

To create colored text and links use:
`[color:red]Red text[/color]`
`[color:#64ffda]Custom color[/color]`
`[link]https://example.com|Click here[/link]`

## Images
Formatted Example:
[image:200:200]https://neoneko.xyz/images/logo.jpg[/image]

To add images use:
`[image]https://your-image-url[/image]`
With size: `[image:200:200]https://your-image-url[/image]`

## Tables
Formatted Example:
|Header 1|Header 2|
|Cell 1|Cell 2|

To create tables use:
`|Header 1|Header 2|`
`|Cell 1|Cell 2|`

## Blockquotes
Formatted Example:
> This is a blockquote
> It can span multiple lines

To create blockquotes use:
`> Start each line with >`[/raw-markdown]

history.changes: Added formatted examples alongside raw syntax
